messages.title: Maintenance at LON1 - 17:15
messages.description:
Start Date: Thursday 24-Jan-2019 - 17:15 UTC
Duration: 30 minutes

The Myra Infrastructre Team will be performing system maintenance. During this maintenance we do not expect any impact for customers.

messages.title: Update of the app backend
messages.description:
Start Date: Monday 18-Mar-2019 - 11:45:00 UTC
Duration: 30 minutes

The Myra team will be performing an update of the app backend. We do not expect any impact for customers during the update procedure.
